Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute near 87th/Lafayette
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses temp rerouted EB: 87th, Vincennes, 79th, Lafayette and 87th; WB 87th, State, 79th, Vincennes and 87th due to, street blockage near 87th/Lafayette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 87th/Lafayette, due to street blockage near 87th/Lafayette.

Eastbound buses will operate via 87th, Vincennes, 79th, Lafayette and 87th including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via 87th, State, 79th, Vincennes and 87th.

Allow extra travel time.
